item.title: Brussels Sprouts Kimchi
item.description: How-to-turn-excess-sprouts-into-kimchi-recipe-zero-waste-cooking Makes 2 x 500g jars 500g brussels sprouts, and/or other greens 250g mixed seasonal vegetables (eg, carrots, jerusalem artichokes, squash, turnip, kohlrabi) 100g dark green leek tops or spring onions Sea salt 4 tbsp brown rice, or white rice flour, gluten-free flour or wheat flour 6 garlic cloves, peeled 1 small red or white onion, peeled 4 tbsp gochujang, or Korean chilli powder or red chilli flakes 50ml fish sauce
